Package ohos.agp.components

Class Component.VoiceEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.Component.VoiceEvent
  • Enclosing class:
    Component

    public static class Component.VoiceEvent
extends Object
    Provides voice events for a component.
    Since:
    3

    • Constructor Summary

      A constructor used to create a VoiceEvent instance based on the hot words.
      VoiceEvent​(String speech, int scene, boolean isUseBadge)
      A constructor used to create a VoiceEvent instance based on the hot words, event scene, and whether to use the event badge.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VoiceEvent

        public VoiceEvent​(String speech,
                  int scene,
                  boolean isUseBadge)
        A constructor used to create a VoiceEvent instance based on the hot words, event scene, and whether to use the event badge.
        Parameters:
        speech - Indicates the hot words.
        scene - Indicates the scene where this event is used.
        isUseBadge - Specifies whether the event badge will be used. Value true indicates to use the badge, and false indicates the opposite.

      • VoiceEvent

        public VoiceEvent​(String speech)
        A constructor used to create a VoiceEvent instance based on the hot words.
        Parameters:
        speech - Indicates the hot words.

    • Method Detail

      • addSynonyms

        public void addSynonyms​(String synonyms)
        Adds synonyms to the voice event.
        Parameters:
        synonyms - Indicates the synonyms to add.

      • setScene

        public void setScene​(int scene)
        Sets the event scene.
        Parameters:
        scene - Indicates the scene where the event will be used.

      • setBadge

        public void setBadge​(boolean enable)
        Sets the event badge.
        Parameters:
        enable - Specifies whether to enable the event badge. Value true indicates to enable the badge, and false indicates to disable the badge.

      • addBadges

        public void addBadges​(String from,
                      String to)
        Sets start and end event badges for a scene.
        Parameters:
        from - Indicates the start event badge.
        to - Indicates the end event badge.
